verses.verse: וַיְצַ֞ו <WH6680> And he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> as much as עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּיתוֹ֮ <WH1004> the steward of his house לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying מַלֵּ֞א <WH4390> Fill אֶת־ <WH853> אַמְתְּחֹ֤ת <WH572> sacks הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> every man's אֹ֔כֶל <WH400> [with] food כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> as they יוּכְל֖וּן <WH3201> they can שְׂאֵ֑ת <WH5375> carry וְשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and put כֶּֽסֶף־ <WH3701> money אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> each בְּפִ֥י <WH6310> mouth אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH572> in his sack's

וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבִיעִ֞י <WH1375> my cup גְּבִ֣יעַ <WH1375> cup הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> the silver תָּשִׂים֙ <WH7760> And put בְּפִי֙ <WH6310> mouth אַמְתַּ֣חַת <WH572> in the sack's הַקָּטֹ֔ן <WH6996> of the youngest וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> money שִׁבְר֑וֹ <WH7668> and his corn וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> that Joseph אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> had spoken
הַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> As soon as the morning א֑וֹר <WH216> light וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> the men שֻׁלְּח֔וּ <WH7971> were sent away הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> with וַחֲמֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2543> they and their asses

הֵ֠ם <WH1992> They יָֽצְא֣וּ <WH3318> [And] when they were gone out אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִיר֮ <WH5892> of the city לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not הִרְחִיקוּ֒ <WH7368> [and] not [yet] far off וְיוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> Joseph אָמַר֙ <WH559> said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> unto בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> unto his steward ק֥וּם <WH6965> Up רְדֹ֖ף <WH7291> follow אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> the men וְהִשַּׂגְתָּם֙ <WH5381> and when thou dost overtake וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> them say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> Why שִׁלַּמְתֶּ֥ם <WH7999> unto them Wherefore have ye rewarded רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> evil תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> good

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> is not זֶ֗ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִשְׁתֶּ֤ה <WH8354> drinketh אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> [Is] not this [it] in which my lord בּ֔וֹ וְה֕וּא <WH1931> he נַחֵ֥שׁ <WH5172> and whereby indeed יְנַחֵ֖שׁ <WH5172> he divineth בּ֑וֹ הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <WH7489> ? ye have done evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> in so doing
וַֽיַּשִּׂגֵ֑ם <WH5381> And he overtook וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> them and he spake אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> unto them these same

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Why יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> unto him Wherefore saith אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my lord כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> according to this thing הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> another חָלִ֙ילָה֙ <WH2486> be far לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> that thy servants מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> A thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> such

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> Behold the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which מָצָ֙אנוּ֙ <WH4672> which we found בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> mouths אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH572> in our sacks' הֱשִׁיבֹ֥נוּ <WH7725> we brought again אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto thee out of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְאֵ֗יךְ <WH349> How נִגְנֹב֙ <WH1589> how then should we steal מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <WH113> out of thy lord's כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> silver א֥וֹ <WH176> or זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> gold

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whomever יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> it be found אִתּ֛וֹ <WH854> for מֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> With whomsoever of thy servants וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> both let him die וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves נִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> and we also will be my lord's לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> bondmen

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said גַּם־ <WH1571> also עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Now כְדִבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1697> to your words כֶּן־ <WH3651> after that ה֑וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom יִמָּצֵ֤א <WH4672> he with whom it is found אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֣י עָ֔בֶד <WH5650> shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you תִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become נְקִיִּֽם׃ <WH5355> and ye shall be blameless

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <WH4116> Then they speedily וַיּוֹרִ֛דוּ <WH3381> took down אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> אַמְתַּחְתּ֖וֹ <WH572> his sack אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וַֽיִּפְתְּח֖וּ <WH6605> and opened אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH572> his sack

וַיְחַפֵּ֕שׂ <WH2664> And he searched בַּגָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> at the eldest הֵחֵ֔ל <WH2490> [and] began וּבַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> at the youngest כִּלָּ֑ה <WH3615> and left וַיִּמָּצֵא֙ <WH4672> was found הַגָּבִ֔יעַ <WH1375> and the cup בְּאַמְתַּ֖חַת <WH572> sack בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> in Benjamin's

וַֽיִּקְרְע֖וּ <WH7167> Then they rent שִׂמְלֹתָ֑ם <WH8071> their clothes וַֽיַּעֲמֹס֙ <WH6006> and laded אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man עַל־ <WH5921> and חֲמֹר֔וֹ <WH2543> his ass וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> and returned הָעִֽירָה׃ <WH5892> to the city

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> And Judah וְאֶחָיו֙ <WH251> and his brethren בֵּ֣יתָה <WH1004> house יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> to Joseph's וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was still שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> for he [was] yet there and they fell לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> before him אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> on the ground

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> And Joseph מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH4639> unto them What deed הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> [is] this that ye have done הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> ? wot ye כִּֽי־ <WH3588> can נַחֵ֧שׁ <WH5172> as I can certainly יְנַחֵ֛שׁ <WH5172> divine אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> not that such a man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that כָּמֹֽנִי׃ <WH3644> such

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> And Judah מַה־ <WH4100> What נֹּאמַר֙ <WH559> What shall we say לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> behold we [are] my lord's מַה־ <WH4100> What נְּדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> answer וּמַה־ <WH4100> What נִּצְטַדָּ֑ק <WH6663> ? or how shall we clear ourselves הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ? God מָצָא֙ <WH4672> hath found out אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants הִנֶּנּ֤וּ <WH2005> behold עֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> servants לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> are my lord's גַּם־ <WH1571> both we and [he] also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <WH587> we גַּ֛ם <WH1571> both אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> is found הַגָּבִ֖יעַ <WH1375> the cup בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> possession

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said חָלִ֣ילָה <WH2486> God forbid לִּ֔י מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> that I should do זֹ֑את <WH2063> so הָאִ֡ישׁ <WH376> [but] the man אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whose נִמְצָ֨א <WH4672> is found הַגָּבִ֜יעַ <WH1375> the cup בְּיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> in whose hand ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֣י עָ֔בֶד <WH5650> he shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֕ם <WH859> you עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and as for you get you up לְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> in peace אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto your father פ

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <WH5066> came near אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> then יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Then Judah וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> unto him and said בִּ֣י <WH994> Oh אֲדֹנִי֒ <WH113> my lord יְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> I pray thee speak נָ֨א <WH4994> please עַבְדְּךָ֤ <WH5650> let thy servant דָבָר֙ <WH1697> a word בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> ears אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> in my lord's וְאַל־ <WH408> nay יִ֥חַר <WH2734> burn אַפְּךָ֖ <WH639> and let not thine anger בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> against thy servant כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> are equal כְּפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> for thou [art] even as Pharaoh

אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord שָׁאַ֔ל <WH7592> asked אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> his servants לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֲיֵשׁ־ <WH3426> Have לָכֶ֥ם אָ֖ב <WH1> ye a father אוֹ־ <WH176> or אָֽח׃ <WH251> We

וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And we said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> unto my lord יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> We have לָ֙נוּ֙ אָ֣ב <WH1> a father זָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> an old man וְיֶ֥לֶד <WH3206> and a child זְקֻנִ֖ים <WH2208> of his old age קָטָ֑ן <WH6996> a little one וְאָחִ֨יו <WH251> and his brother מֵ֜ת <WH4191> is dead וַיִּוָּתֵ֨ר <WH3498> and he alone is left ה֧וּא <WH1931> he לְבַדּ֛וֹ <WH905> alone לְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> of his mother וְאָבִ֥יו <WH1> and his father אֲהֵבֽוֹ׃ <WH157> loveth

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And thou saidst אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <WH3381> Bring him down אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וְאָשִׂ֥ימָה <WH7760> unto me that I may set עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> mine eyes עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> we

וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And we said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> unto my lord לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> cannot הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> The lad לַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> leave אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וְעָזַ֥ב <WH5800> for [if] he should leave אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father וָמֵֽת׃ <WH4191> [his father] would die

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And thou saidst אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants אִם־ <WH518> Except לֹ֥א <WH3808> Except יֵרֵ֛ד <WH3381> come down אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> your youngest אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֹסִפ֖וּן <WH3254> add לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> see פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> my face

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כִּ֣י <WH3588> when עָלִ֔ינוּ <WH5927> And it came to pass when we came up אֶֽל־ <WH413> to עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> unto thy servant אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father וַנַּ֨גֶּד־ <WH5046> we told ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> him the words אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> of my lord
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said אָבִ֑ינוּ <WH1> And our father שֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <WH7666> [and] buy לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־ <WH4592> us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> food

וַנֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And we said לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> We cannot לָרֶ֑דֶת <WH3381> go down אִם־ <WH518> If יֵשׁ֩ <WH3426> be אָחִ֨ינוּ <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹ֤ן <WH6996> if our youngest אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH854> for וְיָרַ֔דְנוּ <WH3381> with us then will we go down כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> for we may לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> not see פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> face הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man's וְאָחִ֥ינוּ <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> our youngest אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> except אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH854> for

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> said עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> And thy servant אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> unto us Ye know כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> me two יָֽלְדָה־ <WH3205> bare לִּ֥י אִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH802> that my wife

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> went out הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> And the one מֵֽאִתִּ֔י <WH853> וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> from me and I said אַ֖ךְ <WH389> Surely טָרֹ֣ף <WH2963> Surely טֹרָ֑ף <WH2963> he is torn in pieces וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not רְאִיתִ֖יו <WH7200> and I saw him עַד־ <WH5704> not הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> not since

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֧ם <WH3947> And if ye take גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֛ה <WH2088> this מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> this also from פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> me וְקָרָ֣הוּ <WH7136> befall him אָס֑וֹן <WH611> and mischief וְהֽוֹרַדְתֶּ֧ם <WH3381> ye shall bring down אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׂיבָתִ֛י <WH7872> my gray hairs בְּרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> with sorrow שְׁאֹֽלָה׃ <WH7585> to the grave

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now כְּבֹאִי֙ <WH935> Now therefore when I come אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> to thy servant אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father וְהַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and the lad אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> else אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH854> since וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> [be] not with us seeing that his life קְשׁוּרָ֥ה <WH7194> is bound up בְנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> in the lad's life
